description: A notification that represents an ICAP-
related event on an ProxySG appliance. The attributes
icapServiceStatsName - the service on which the event
connections on the service, at the time of event
connections on the service, at the time of event.

Summary.eval: ($v2 == 1) ? 'Queued connections above threshold on ICAP service $v2' : (($v2 == 2) ? 'Queued connections below threshold on ICAP service $v2' : (($v2 == 3) ? 'Deferred connections above threshold on ICAP service $v2' : 'Deferred connections below threshold on ICAP service $v2'))

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BLUECOAT-SG-ICAP-MIB::sgICAPTrap BLUECOAT-SG-ICAP-MIB::sgICAPNotification i 1 BLUECOAT-SG-ICAP-MIB::icapServiceStatsName s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-SG-ICAP-MIB::icapServiceStatsDeferredReqs u 9999 BLUECOAT-SG-ICAP-MIB::icapServiceStatsQueuedReqs u 9999

description: A notification type that describes an ICAP event.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-SG-ICAP-MIB::sgICAPNotification

description: name of the service or the service group.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-SG-ICAP-MIB::icapServiceStatsName

description: Number of ICAP scanning transactions that
have been deferred until the full object has
variables.name: BLUECOAT-SG-ICAP-MIB::icapServiceStatsDeferredReqs

description: ICAP scanning transactions that are waiting
variables.name: BLUECOAT-SG-ICAP-MIB::icapServiceStatsQueuedReqs
